description.en: ART-Talks, a hybrid form of conferences, is accepting submissions. We welcome written essays, PPT presentations, and audio-visual essays (auto-biographical or analytic documentary style), that explore “Women’s Perspective in Korean Film.” From this year, a new section called EMERGENTS is installed that accepts essays of students and young researchers in universities, and members of the general public.
description.fr: ART-Talks constitute une forme hybride de conférences. Nous accueillons les essais écrits, les présentations PPT et les essais audiovisuels (style documentaire autobiographique ou analytique), qui explorent le thème « Perspectives des femmes dans le cinéma coréen ». À partir de cette année, la nouvelle section EMERGENTS accepte les essais des étudiants et jeunes chercheurs des universités, et des membres du grand public.
description.kor: ART-Talks, a hybrid form of conferences, is accepting submissions. We welcome written essays, PPT presentations, and audio-visual essays (auto-biographical or analytic documentary style), that explore “Women’s Perspective in Korean Film.” From this year, a new section called EMERGENTS is installed that accepts essays of students and young researchers in universities, and members of the general public.

title.en: "Back to the Roots from Women's Perspective"
title.fr: "Back to the Roots from Women's Perspective"
title.kor: "Back to the Roots from Women's Perspective"
